They are outstanding external libraries used by ToyBox.
Some of those third-party projects in ToyBox have been modified or reduce size.


    SFML-2.3.2          zlib License
    OpenAL-Soft         LGPL license
    libjpeg             public domain
    stb_image           public domain
    freetype            FreeType license or GPL license
    libogg              BSD license
    libvorbis           BSD license
    libflac             BSD license


    zlib-1.2.8          zlib License
    libpng-1.6.12       libpng License
